creator: Landis+Gyr AG
descriptionHtml:
The Landis+Gyr UltraAssist App will make your daily work easier.
Instead of using the lap top for meter readings, data transfer or parameterization of communication options, you can now use your Android smartphone or tablet.
The simple and intuitive user interface guides you through the individual options. Meters can be put into operation with little effort, data can be read out and sent by e-mail.

FEATURES:
- Offline functionality
- Fast read-out of consumption data with only 2-clicks
- Structured data management
- Simple forwarding of meter data
- Setting of meter time
- Fast setting of M-Bus primary addresses
- Languages: English and German
- Requires an USB-OTG adapter
descriptionShort: The mobile solution for commissioning, meter reading and data transfer.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New Features:

- UltraAssist for Android now allows reading out the UH50 data logger in one simple step.
- Improved stability of the meter data information.
- The meter picture function had a bug, which we fixed.

title: UltraAssist

creator: Landis+Gyr AG
descriptionHtml:
The Landis+Gyr UltraAssist App will make your daily work easier.

The simple and intuitive user interface guides you through the individual options. Meters can be put into operation with little effort, data can be read out and sent by e-mail.

- Fast read-out of consumption data with only 2-clicks
- Structured data management
- Simple forwarding of meter data

- Fast setting of M-Bus primary addresses
- Languages: English and German
- Requires an USB-OTG adapter
descriptionShort: The mobile solution for commissioning, meter reading and data transfer.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- UltraAssist for Android can now also be operated in Italian.
- Parameter files for M-Bus and wM-Bus, created with UltraAssist for Windows from version 2.07.04, can now be played with the app.
- Minor bug fixes and stability improvements.
